Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the health check ID, such as e0a123b4-4dba-4650-935e-example.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The identifier that Amazon Route 53 assigned to the health check when you created it. When you add or update a resource record set, you use this value to specify which health check to use. The value can be up to 64 characters long.
